short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Budget online spendings while tracking your shopping carts across sites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Budget online spending while tracking your shopping carts across sites. 

This extension provides users with real time management of their online budgeting by tracking their budget and total across multiple different sites. It doubles as a universal shopping cart and wish list enabling cross site product tracking. Whether you are just browsing or actively looking to buy, shopping will be made easy, smart, and organized. 

How it works: 

Go to the product page of any supported retailer. Click Add Item and the item will be added to Budget Cart. 

Update Budget will enable the user to update their budget. 

The Buy All button will open every item in the cart in a new tab and will recalculate the user's budget.  

Currently supported retailers: Amazon, Urban Outfitters, Zara, PacSun, Macy's, Nordstrom, Nike, and many more to come! 

Note: Budget Cart is not able to calculate tax prices at the current moment.
